text: we often think about code-breaking and
this sort of thing as being a bit of a
James Bond style thing we use it in Wars
we use it in in bombs we think of it as
very glamorous a Harry Houdini kind of
experience
in reality of course in the world today
in a world as digital and interconnected
as as ours is it's now all around us
it's just into woven into the fabric of
our lives
every time you go online every time you
use your ATM card every time you use a

encryption of that information it's been

and economic standpoint
